name: CodeChaos
description:
This is  our project entry for Mini Jam 120: Hell², unfortunately, we had to cut many features such as level gimmick using controlled enemy to solve puzzles...anyway, it's decent as it is though.

Credits:-
Mikado: Developer
Erie: Developer
EienNoBeginner:BGM
SFBDim:ChipTone to make sounds.
Kenny:FootstepSound(Impact sounds)
szadiart : Pixel Platformer Castle and Pixel Castle 2D 
cathean: LiteUI Fantasy 
franuka: RPG Icon Pack Demo
bonvicio: Pixel Art Bonfire luizmelo: Fire Worm, Monsters Creatures Fantasy and Evil Wizard2
ppeldo: 2DPixel Art Game Spellmagic FX
Godot: Great engine when you know how to work with it.

Thanks to FireBelley for his course , if it's not for him, I wouldn't be able to understand how Godot work.
